wikipedia_page.main:
Christopher David Walsh (born 6 November 1975) is a former English cricketer.  Walsh is a right-handed batsman who bowls leg break. He was born at Pembury, Kent.
Walsh made his first-class debut for Kent against Oxford University in 1996.  From 1996 to 1998, he represented Kent in 4 first-class matches, with his final appearance for the county coming against Northamptonshire.In 2000, Walsh joined Cambridgeshire, where he made his debut for the county  in his only List-A appearance, which came Cumberland.He also represented the county in the Minor Counties Championship, where he made his debut for the county in that competition against Cumberland. He represented the county in 2 further Minor Counties matches against Buckinghamshire and Norfolk.

response: Christopher or Chris Walsh may refer to:
* Chris Walsh (American football) (born 1968), American football player
* Chris Walsh (politician) (1951-2018), American architect and politician
* Chris Walsh (rugby league) (born 1962), Australian rugby league footballer
